Translations.Text: soganda che udavine vikhera'i nakhanarana (arthata te hava'ona soganda je matine udavine vikheri nakhe che)
pachi bhara uthavanarana
pachi naramithi calanarana (panimam calanari hodi'o)
pachi karyane vahenci nakhanara (arthata te pharista'o je'o karyani vahencani kari lem che)
ni:Sanka tamane je vacano karavamam ave che, (badha) sacca che
ane ni:Sanka n'yaya thase
soganda che vividha rupovala akasana
ni:Sanka tame vividha vato karo cho
anathi te vancita rakhavamam ave che je phari gayo hoya
nasta thaya atakalo karanara
je'o bedarakara che ane bhanavihona che
puche che ke badalano divasa kayare avase
ham, a te divasa che ke a loko agamam ulata-pulata padaya hase
potana upadravano svada cakho, a ja che, jeni tame utavala karata hata
ni:Sanka daranara'o jannato ane jharana'omam hase
temana palanahare je kami temane apyu che tene la'i rahya hase, te to a pahela pana sadacari hata
te'o ratre khuba ja ochum suta hata
ane sahari na samaye maphi mangata hata
ane temana dhanamam mangavavala'o mate ane mangavathi bacanara'o mate bhaga hato
ane visrvasa karanara'o mate to dharati para ghani ja nisani'o che
ane svayam tamara astitavamam pana, sum tame jota nathi
tamari roji ane je vacana tamane karavamam ave che, badhu ja akasamam che
Akasa ane dharatina palanaharana soganda, ke a kharekhara saccum che, evum ja jevi ke tame vato karo cho
sum tamane ibrahimana pratisthita mahemanoni khabara pahonci che
te'o jyare temani pase avya to temane salama karyum, ibrahime salamano javaba apyo (ane kahyum a to) ajanya loko che
pachi cupacapa jhadapathi potana gharavala'o pase gaya ane eka hastapusta vacharadum (num masa) lavya
ane tene temani same mukayum. Ane kahyum tame khata nathi
pachi manamam ja temanathi bhayabhita tha'i gaya, temane kahyum â€œtame bhayabhita na thavaâ€ ane temane (hajharata ibrahima) ne eka jnanavana santanani khusakhabara api
basa! Temani patni agala vadhi ane asrcaryamam potana modham upara hatha marata kahyum ke hum to gharadi chum ane sathe vanjhani pana
temane kahyum ham tara palanahare avi ja rite pharamavyum che. Ni:Sanka te tattavadarsi ane jananara che
(hajharata ibrahime) kahyum ke allahana mokalela (pharista'o) tamaro sum hetu che
temane javaba apyo ke ame duracari koma tarapha mokalavamam avya che
jethi ame temana para matini kankari'o varasavi'e
je tara palanahara taraphathi nisanavali che, te hadavatavi nakhanara'o mate
basa! Jetala imanavala'o tyam hata, ame temane bacavi lidha
ane ame tyam musalmanonum phakata eka ja ghara joyum
ane ame tyam temana mate, je du:Khadayi yatanano dara rakhe che eka nisani chodi
musana (kis'sa) mam (pana amara tarapha thi eka nisani che) ke ame tene phira'ona tarapha khulla purava api mokalya
basa! Tene potana samarthya upara mondhu pheravyum ane kaheva lagyo a jadugara che athava to pagala che
Chevate ame tene ane tena laskarane amari yatanamam pakadi dariyamam nakhi didho ane te hato ja jhatakanine layaka
avi ja rite adamam (pana amara tarapha thi eka nisani che) jyare ame te'ona para ujjada pavana mokalyo
te je vastu para padati tene khokhara hadaka jevum (cure cura) kari nakhati hati
ane samuda (na kis'sa) mam pana (cetavani) che, jyare te'one kahevamam avyu ke tame thodaka divaso sudhi phayado uthavi lo
parantu te'o'e potana palanaharana adesano bhanga karyo, jethi te'one jotajatamam (vavajhoda) e nasta kari didha
basa! Na to te'o ubha tha'i sakya ane na to badalo la'i sakya
ane nuhani komane pana a pahela (avi ja dasa tha'i hati) te'o pana ghana ja avajnakari hata
akasane ame (potana) hatho vade banavyum che ane ni:Sanka ame vistrta karavavala che
ane dharati ne ame patharanum banavi didhum che. Basa! Ame khuba ja sari rite patharavavala che
ane dareka vastune ame jodakamam peda kari che. Jethi tame sikhamana prapta karo
basa! Tame allaha tarapha dodo bhago. Ni:Sanka hum tamane tena taraphathi khulle khulli cetavani apanaro chum
ane allaha sathe bija ko'ine pana pujya na theravo. Ni:Sanka hum tamane teni tarapha khulli cetavani apanara chum
avi ja rite je loko temana pahela hata, te'oni pase je pana payagambara avya te'o'e kahim didhu ke a to jadugara che athava to pagala che
sum a loko'e te vatani ekabijane vasiyata kari che? (Na) parantu a badha ja vidrohi che
to tame te'othi modhum pheravi lo, tamara para ko'i vandho nathi
ane sikhamana apata raho, ni:Sanka a sikhamana imanavala'one phayado pahoncadase
Mem jinnata ane manavi'one phakata etala mate ja peda karya che ke te'o phakata mari ja bandagi kare
na hum te'othi roji icchum chum ane na to mari iccha che ke a loko mane khavadave
allaha ta'ala to pote ja darekane roji pahoncadanara, saktimana ane takatavara che
basa! Je loko'e atyacara karyo che te'one pana te'ona sathi'o maphaka ja malase, jethi te'o utavala na kare
basa! Kharabi che, inkari'o mate te divase, je divasanum vacana temane apavamam avyum che
